children.title: Source Code
children.markdown:
Pressing this button evaluates the expression and navigates to the resulting URL (must be a single string URL). Internal URLs look like "/page/Home":

```
{
  "widget": "button"
  "text": "Goto Dashjoin Homepage",
  "print": "\"https://www.dashjoin.com\""
}
```

Pressing this button evaluates the expression and prints its result at the bottom of the screen.

```
{
  "widget": "button"
  "text": "Call a function",
  "print": "$call(\"invoke\", 3)"
}
```
